entities.name: sibyll trelawney
entities.description: Sibyll Trelawney is a person who has the ability to speak in an ethereal, mystic voice. However, in this instance, she speaks in harsh, hoarse tones that Harry had heard her use once before.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has seen Sibyll Trelawney speak in both ethereal and harsh voices.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is an entity that will mark the one with power as his equal, but the one with power has abilities that the Dark Lord does not know.

entities.name: the one with the power to vanquish the dark lord
entities.description: The One with Power is a person who will be born as the seventh month dies and has the ability to vanquish the Dark Lord.

relationships.description: Sibyll Trelawney has spoken to Harry in both ethereal and harsh tones.

relationships.entity_2: the one with the power to vanquish the dark lord
relationships.description: The Dark Lord will mark The One with Power as his equal, but The One with Power has abilities that The Dark Lord does not know.

relationships.entity_1: the one with the power to vanquish the dark lord
relationships.description: The One with Power will be able to vanquish The Dark Lord.
